channel.title: transcription activator on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in transcription activator on funPlantGenes

item.title: AcHZP45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AcHZP45 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AcHZP45 is a repressor of chlorophyll biosynthesis and activator of chlorophyll degradation in kiwifruit.

item.title: BnWRI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnWRI1 Gene Name: AP2/EREBP transcription factor Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnWRI1 coordinates fatty acid biosynthesis and photosynthesis pathways during oil accumulation in rapeseed.

item.title: BrABF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bra011485 Gene Symbol: BrABF3 Gene Name: transcription activator ABF3 Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: The BrABF3 promoter is specifically active in the Arabidopsis leaf vascular tissue, where CO is mainly expressed.

item.title: BrpABI449
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BrpABI449 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: BrpNAC895 and BrpABI449 coregulate the transcription of the afflux-type cadmium transporter BrpHMA2 in Brassica parachinensis.

item.title: BrpHMA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BrpHMA2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: BrpHMA2 was induced by Cd stress and specifically expressed in vascular tissues, and the protein was localized in the plasma membrane.

item.title: BrpNAC895
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BrpNAC895 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: BrpNAC895 and BrpABI449 coregulate the transcription of the afflux-type cadmium transporter BrpHMA2 in Brassica parachinensis.

item.title: CaMYB31
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaMYB31 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor Cap1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Natural variations in the MYB transcription factor MYB31 determine the evolution of extremely pungent peppers.

item.title: CaNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaNAC1 Gene Name: NAC domain protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CaNAC1 regulates low-temperature-induced phospholipid degradation in green bell pepper.

item.title: CmBBX22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3_sc004370.1_g0600.1 Gene Symbol: CmBBX22 Gene Name: BBX transcription factor 22 Genome: Chrysanthemum seticuspe genome release CSE_r1.

item.title: CmHRE2-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmHRE2-like Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum (Chrysanthemum morifolium) CmHRE2-like negatively regulates the resistance of chrysanthemum to the aphid (Macrosiphoniella sanborni).

item.title: CmNAC-NOR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C016540 Gene Symbol: CmNAC-NOR Gene Name: Genome: Melon (DHL92) v3.

item.title: CsbZIP44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g25230 Gene Symbol: CsbZIP44 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsbZIP44 is essential for ABA-mediated carotenoid biosynthesis in citrus.

item.title: CsERF061
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsERF061 Gene Name: group I ethylene response factor 61 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Ethylene activation of carotenoid biosynthesis by a novel transcription factor CsERF061.

item.title: CsMADS3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs7g10980.3 Gene Symbol: CsMADS3 Gene Name: MADS-box transcription factor 3 Genome: Citrus sinensis Valencia genome v1.

item.title: CsMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMYB1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cannabis Sativa Functional Description: CsWRKY1 and CsMYB1 may serve as negative regulators of THCAS expression.

item.title: CsMYB73
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA014193.1 Gene Symbol: CsMYB73 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 73 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYB73 negatively regulates theanine accumulation mediated by CsGGT2 and CsGGT4 in tea shoots.

item.title: CsNAC7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsNAC7 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsWRKY1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cannabis Sativa Functional Description: CsWRKY1 and CsMYB1 may serve as negative regulators of THCAS expression.

item.title: DkMYB14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMYB14 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMYB14 is a bifunctional transcription factor that regulates the accumulation of proanthocyanidin in persimmon fruit.

item.title: FaMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaMYB1 Gene Name: transcription factor MYB1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: The strawberry transcription factor FaMYB1 inhibits the biosynthesis of proanthocyanidins in Lotus corniculatus leaves.

item.title: GhMYB24
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMYB24 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB-like protein 24 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A Cotton Gene Encoding MYB-Like Transcription Factor (GhMYB24) is Specifically Expressed in Pollen and is Involved in Regulation of Late Anther/Pollen Development.

item.title: GmMYBA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.09G235100.1 Gene Symbol: GmMYBA2 Gene Name: MYB FAMILY TRANSCRIPTION FACTOR Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmMYBA2 and GmMYBR synergistically function in a loop to control the biosynthesis of anthocyanin in soybean MYB transcription factors GmMYBA2 and GmMYBR function in a feedback loop to control pigmentation of seed coat in soybean.

item.title: GmMYBR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.20G013000.1 Gene Symbol: GmMYBR Gene Name: MYB FAMILY TRANSCRIPTION FACTOR Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmMYBA2 and GmMYBR synergistically function in a loop to control the biosynthesis of anthocyanin in soybean MYB transcription factors GmMYBA2 and GmMYBR function in a feedback loop to control pigmentation of seed coat in soybean.

item.title: HvDOF19
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvDOF19 Gene Name: dof zinc finger protein19 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The HvDOF19 transcription factor mediates the abscisic acid-dependent repression of hydrolase genes in germinating barley aleurone.

item.title: LjbHLH7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lj0g3v0343449 Gene Symbol: LjbHLH7 Gene Name: MeJA-responsive bHLH transcription factor Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: MeJA-responsive bHLH transcription factor LjbHLH7 regulates cyanogenic glucoside biosynthesis in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: MdARF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000886637 Gene Symbol: MdARF1 Gene Name: ARF domain class transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The miR7125-MdARF1 module enhances the resistance of apple to Colletotrichum gloeosporioides by promoting lignin synthesis in response to salicylic acid signalling.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.01G240100 Gene Symbol: Pd1 Gene Name: dense pubescence 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A Pd1–Ps–P1 Feedback Loop Controls Pubescence Density in Soybean.

item.title: PeSTZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PeSTZ1 Gene Name: SALT TOLERANCE ZINC FINGER 1 Genome: Species: Populus euphratica Functional Descriptions: PeSTZ1, a C2H2-type zinc finger transcription factor from Populus euphratica, enhances freezing tolerance through modulation of ROS scavenging by directly regulating PeAPX2.

item.title: TaASR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4D02G109500.1 Gene Symbol: TaASR1 Gene Name: Abscisic stress-ripening protein 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaASR1, a transcription factor gene in wheat, confers drought stress tolerance in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: TaGW8-7A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS7A02G260500 Gene Symbol: TaGW8-7A Gene Name: Grain Weight 8 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaGW8, a member of the SPL gene family, is located on wheat group 7 chromosomes.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS7B02G158500 Gene Symbol: TaGW8-7B Gene Name: Grain Weight 8 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaGW8, a member of the SPL gene family, is located on wheat group 7 chromosomes.

item.title: TaPIMP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaPIMP1 Gene Name: R2R3 Myb-like protein Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: An R2R3 MYB transcription factor in wheat, TaPIMP1, mediates host resistance to Bipolaris sorokiniana and drought stresses through regulation of defense- and stress-related genes.

item.title: VrMYB90
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VrMYB90 Gene Name: transcription factor MYB90 Genome: Species: Vigna radiata Functional Descriptions: VrMYB90 Functions Synergistically with VrbHLHA and VrMYB3 to Regulate Anthocyanin Biosynthesis in Mung Bean.

item.title: VvJAZ2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvJAZ2 Gene Name: JA signaling suppressor Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Determined that VvWRKY5 regulated the JA response by directly binding to the promoters of VvJAZ2 (a JA signaling suppressor) and VvMYC2 (a JA signaling activator), thereby inhibiting and activating the transcription of VvJAZ2 and VvMYC2, respectively.
